settings.heading: Hedgrenist
settings.content: Our Hedgrenists know the world is full of opportunities and are eager to take them on. Expanding their comfort zone, one challenge at a time, is what keeps them going. Meet our urban adventures and find out how they stand their ground. Discover how Hedgren plays a role in keeping them level-headed.

settings.subtitle: OUR COLLECTIONS
settings.your_text: Your favorite everyday companion. Ready-to-go bags and travel gear for everyday use.

settings.heading: Become a hedgrenist
settings.content: Let’s move together! Wherever you’re headed, we’ve got your back. Enjoy our rewards, special offers, exclusive events and inside information on our wonderful products.

settings.heading: How it started
settings.content: Never underestimate a Belgian brand on a mission. We’ve been around since 1993, and have always remained true to our purpose. Wherever you go, we’re right next to you. We’re your most faithful, reliable and eager companion.

settings.heading: How it’s going
settings.content: We understand your needs evolve as your world changes. That is why we still design our collections to fit your plans. We know where you’re coming from and see where you’re headed. We happen to be facing the same direction.

settings.question: Where do you deliver?
settings.answer: Currently Hedgren delivers to customers who have an address in Austria, Belgium, Croatia, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Italy, Ireland, Luxembourg, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, the Netherlands and United Kingdom.

settings.question: Is there a shipping charge for orders?
settings.answer:
We offer FREE SHIPPING on all orders to residential addresses in Austria, Belgium, Denmark, France mainland, Germany, Luxembourg and the Netherlands. Deliveries to residential addresses in Croatia, Czech Republic, Estonia, Finland, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Lithuania, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom and also the islands are subject to an actual calculated transport cost which is shown in the shipping method section of the checkout process.

Please note that we have no control over custom matters/import duties. Delivery to countries outside the European Union might involve additional custom costs.

settings.question: I want to return the order for a refund, what should I do?
settings.answer:
Returns will only be accepted within 14 days of the delivery date.

For further questions view our returns page or get in contact with customer service. Please note that we have no control over custom matters/import duties. Delivery to countries outside the European Union might involve additional custom costs.

settings.testimonial_text: Love this bag!! Great colour, enough space for all things required, even when going out with kids. A lot of pockets, waterproof (really important in Scotland) and very  light. I have 2 fancy lather bag - hate that they are very heavy. This doesn't make you feel that you have such a large bag. The second time I buy from Hedgren, and really love the brand.
settings.author: Luminita M.

settings.testimonial_text: Wonderful bag very easy and light to wear. What I was looking for!
settings.author: loredana C.

settings.testimonial_text: I own this bag since 3 years and I use it everyday. It's like new, and it always looks fine, in every context - work, going for a walk, dancing. I love the compartments. I had a similar bigger Hedgren before which used for more than 10 years.
settings.author: Corinna

settings.testimonial_text: An amazing high quality backpack I always buy Hedgren products as they are so well made.
settings.author: Katharine P.

settings.heading: Our values
settings.content:
Regardless of in-between distances, within our global network we will always be connected by the 6 values that lie embedded in our Hedgren DNA. And we will always be open to include everybody

who shares our values in our family circle. Therefore we look at people with an open mind. We respect their personality and personal style and we’re always ready to fulfil their desire to belong.

settings.heading: Move
settings.subheading: We want everybody to be free to move
settings.content:
It’s our mission to create essential bags and travel gear with smart functionality that helps you handle everyday adventures without compromising on your personality or freedom to move.

We promise that you will become part of an inclusive community that creates and embraces an endless portion of wanderlust.

We help you to get the most out of life by enabling your freedom of movement.

settings.heading: Contact us
settings.contact_text: If you have a remark, question or anything else we can help you with please fill in the form and we’ll get back to you asap.
settings.contact_info:
Tel: +32 (0)15 300 560

We can be reached by telephone during office hours. Monday to Thursday between 9 AM & 5 PM CET. Friday between 9 AM & 4 PM CET.
settings.thank: Thank you for getting in touch, we'll get back to you.

settings.heading: Privacy Policy
settings.content:
This privacy Policy governs the processing of your personal data by HEDGREN CREATIONS NV, Grote Steenweg 50, 2550 Kontich - Belgium when you visit HEDGREN E-Store. HEDGREN respects your privacy and strives to conform to the rules rules under applicable EU Regulation. Note : If you want general information on how we process your personal data through cookies, please refer to our Cookie Policy.

1. WHO IS RESPONSIBLE FOR YOUR DATA?
When you visit HEDGREN Website and E-Store, HEDGREN CREATIONS NV, Grote Steenweg 50, 2550 Kontich is responsible for the processing of your personal data. At any time, you may contact us via E-store@hedgren.com with any privacy question or concerns you may have (see also point 8 hereafter “What rights do you have?”) HEDGREN reserves the right to change, modify or amend this Privacy Policy at its own discretion, or change, modify or withdraw access to the E-Store Website at any time and/or without notice. HEDGREN will notify you of such change or modification by posting an updated version of this Privacy Policy on the E-store Website.

HEDGREN uses cookies on the E-Store Website. By clicking on “OK” after having being informed of our use of cookies, you acknowledge that you have read this Cookie Policy carefully and that you agree with it without reservation. Most browsers allow you to accept or refuse cookies. If you don’t want that Web sites can store cookies on your computer, you can adjust your browser settings. You will receive a warning before cookies are being posted. You can also customize your settings so that your browser refuses all cookies or only third party cookies. You can also remove cookies that have already been posted. Please note that you must adjust the settings separately for each browser on each device that you use. We want to remind you that if you do not want to use cookies, we unfortunately cannot guarantee that our online store is working properly. It may be that some features of the online store are lost or that you no longer can see certain pages at all. In addition, also note that rejecting cookies does not mean you will see no ads anymore. It just means the ads are not adapted to your interests anymore and are repeated more often. How you can customize your settings varies between browsers. Click on the links below to go directly to the manual of your browser or consult the help function of your browser if necessary. Chrome - Safari - Firefox - Internet Explorer Edge Would you like to turn off cookies from specific parties, you can do so via www.youronlinechoices.com.

settings.question: How can I place an order?
settings.answer: To place an order select your desired item and add it to your shopping cart. If you are interested in buying one or more items, you can change the quantity and selection in the course of the buying process. Follow the instructions on the checkout page to complete your order. As soon as you confirm your order, an automated e-mail confirmation will be sent.

settings.question: What payment methods can I use?
settings.answer: We offer Visa, Mastercard, AMEX, Maestro, iDEAL, Bancontact/Mister Cash, SOFORT Banking, Bitcoin, Belfius & KBC/CBC.
